articles.title: Rosenthal: Momentum matters in American League race and Rays’ bullpen is providing it - The Athletic

articles.author: Dustin Hockensmith | dhockensmith@pennlive.com
articles.title: Talking Penn State-Illinois, Bret Bielema’s PSU remark, and James Franklin’s Pribula plans: Blue-White Breakd - PennLive
articles.description: Penn State hits the road for its eighth straight road Big Ten opener, marching into Champaign as two-touchdown favorites against Bret Bielema’s Fighting Illini.
